Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Kersting
Reviews.Content: For the price it seems that this camera is the best in its class. Sony makes one that costs a little more, and some say it has some slight advantages in its overall capabilities, but the Canon is undisputedly the best for ease and convenience of use. Anyway, to master all of its extremely many features will take months of fun practice as it is. If you are looking for something compact and versatile, with loads of features, get this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor
ISO 80-12800
1080p/60p Full HD video
5x Optical Zoom and a 24mm Wide-Angle lens
Capacitive 3.0" touch panel LCD
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot S120 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video Premiere Bundle
